## Overview

`floralcurves` is a package for analyzing and visualizing landscape-scale floral resource dynamics.  

![Alt text](https://github.com/sponslerdb/floralcurves/blob/main/inst/extdata/model_schematic.png?raw=true "Title")

## Setup
```{r include=FALSE}
library(floralcurves)
library(ggplot2)
```

## 1. Generate landscape

Landscape are generated with the function `landgen()`, which serves as a wrapper for functions in the package `landscapeR` `citep(citation("landscapeR"))`.
```{r}
land1 <- landgen(area = 10000, 
                 prop1 = 0.5, 
                 prop2 = 0.1, 
                 n1 = 25, 
                 n2 = 25)
```


## Installation

`devtools::install_github("sponslerdb/floralcurves")`
